commits.message:
Update "check-locale-sync" to skip ignored keys in Spanish (#1284)

We have been doing a lot of development lately where we add English keys
and add them to the "ignore_missing" configuration for i18n-tasks so
they aren't considered missing. But the "check-locale-sync" check still
fails.

This commit updates the "check-locale-sync" to ignore these keys as
well, if they are changed in English and ignored in Spanish.
commits.author: Tom Dooner

commits.message:
FFS-3525: Add controller name to structured logging messages (#1281)

Out of the box, the semantic logging gem logs lines like this:

> "Completed #show"

This is not so easy to scan in NewRelic, since the context of which
controller was being rendered is missing.

It looks like we can customize this. This commit updates the format to
be something like:

> "Completed Cbv::EntriesController#show"
commits.author: Tom Dooner
